utils.hyperelasticity.hyperelasticity_utils.compute_elastic_properties()[source]¶

Computes all elastic parameters given any two.

Parameters:

  • e_modul (float, optional) – Young’s modulus

  • nu (float, optional) – Poisson’s ratio

  • shear (float, optional) – Shear modulus (mu)

  • lame (float, optional) – Lame’s first parameter (lambda)

Returns:

  • nu (float) – Poisson’s ratio

  • lame (float) – Lame’s parameter (lambda)

  • shear (float) – Shear modulus (mu)

  • e_modul (float) – Young’s modulus
